shared

Class SumOfSquaresError

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.AbstractErrorMeasure
      • shared.SumOfSquaresError
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ErrorMeasure, GradientErrorMeasure

    public class SumOfSquaresError
extends AbstractErrorMeasure
implements GradientErrorMeasure
    Standard error measure, suitable for use with linear output networks for regression, sigmoid output networks for single class probability, and soft max networks for multi class probabilities.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andrew Guillory gtg008g@mail.gatech.edu
